EmailTemplate.name: Partner Info Requests
EmailTemplate.subject: Onboarding complete - please provide user information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We've processed all your necessary onboarding documents - welcome aboard! To gain access to your BlueWave Portal, please provide us with the following:
1) List of users A list of all individuals you'd like to grant portal access to, including: their full name, email, title, rep access (to view only their customers) or administrative access (to view all customers), and phone number (send via email).
2) Your Company Logo A copy of your organization's logo (send via email).
3) Bank Info Your company banking info so we can create an ACH account to disburse your funds (call 888-817-2703 to provide)
- Bank Name - Routing # - Account #
Once we've received this information, we will be in touch regarding next steps.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
